Articles.Content:
Hello! 

I just wanted to make a battle of several aircraft using the BahamutoD armory mod, but I ended creating cinematic introduction and plot behind the whole bloodshed. Or, maybe oilshed, becouse I turned some of the stock aircraft into drones remotely controlled by Kerbals (plot-wise). ;-)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Fq2psjHnJyc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
